org.tagaprice.core.entities
Class Account

java.lang.Object
  org.tagaprice.core.entities.Account

@Entity
public class Account
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an user-account of some type. For instance this type can be local (saved in our database) or OAuth or similar. TODO Different user-account types should subclass this class. this now represents a localAccount.

An Account has the following properties:

  • Uid: primary identifier in the database
  • email: email-address of the user who owns this account. This must be unique since it represents this user
  • lastLogin: date of the last login of this user

This class is immutable. Properties once set, cannot be changed.

Author:
haja

Constructor Detail

Account

public Account(java.lang.Long uid,
               java.lang.String email,
               java.lang.String password,
               java.util.Date lastLogin)
Initialize a new Account.

Parameters:
uid - Uid of this account. Can be null, in which case this account is treated as new concerning the database and a fresh id will be created and assigend. If uid is not null it must not be greater than 0.
email - email-address of the user who owns this account. This must be unique since it represents this user
lastLogin - date of the last login of this user
